title: i lost a owned champion[GAME CRASH]
body:
hi, 
around 2 weeks ago i didnt log into my accout for like 3 days when i logged back in i found that i cnat play VEL'KOZ anymore ,that i was asked buy him again with 6300 IP i'm a level 5 VEL'KOZ it's my main with 40k EXP so obviously i owned him once and you can't reach level 5 in one week please check my problem :){{champion:161}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! For something like this, it would be best to [shoot us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your account and see what may have happened to Vel'Koz. He may have fallen into the Void. ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=T8MoZrEq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-26T17:22:26.721+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! For something like this, it would be best to [shoot us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your account and see what may have happened to Vel'Koz. **He may have fallen into the Void. ;)**
This is the reason why Rito is amazing.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=T8MoZrEq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-26T17:22:26.721+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! For something like this, it would be best to [shoot us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your account and see what may have happened to Vel'Koz. He may have fallen into the Void. ;)

I see what you did there. You clever human being, you.
